title: Bloomberg's Rana on Microsoft Paring Back Smartphones (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Rana on Microsoft Paring Back Smartphones (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Anurag Rana, Senior Analyst of Software & IT Services for Bloomberg Intelligence, on consolidation in the IT services business, and Microsoft taking a charge and paring back smartphone ambitions.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
